movies.title: Dead Within
movies.plot: Six months after the outbreak, a man and woman have survived by isolating themselves in a remote cabin. Starved for resources, they must confront the horrors that threaten them from outside and from within.
movies.simplePlot: Six months after the outbreak, a man and woman have survived by isolating themselves in a remote cabin. Starved for resources, they must confront the horrors that threaten them from outside and from within.

biography.bio: Dean Chekvala is an actor and director, known for People Like Us (2012), True Blood (2008) and Reception (2011).
biography.name: Dean Chekvala

biography.bio: J. Claude Deering was born on December 12, 1981 in London, England as Jonathan Henry Claude Deering. He is an actor and writer, known for Side Effects (2013), 12 Deadly Days (2016) and Entourage (2004).
biography.name: J. Claude Deering

biography.bio: Born in Philadelphia, Rick Federman had a successful career in radio advertising. While at work the production department started to use him for on-air bits, commercial voice overs and comedic impressions. Rick began auditioning and working on other projects in Philadelphia & NY. This opened the doors to acting and eventually lead him to move to Los Angeles to pursue acting full-time.
biography.name: Rick Federman

biography.bio: Sarah McMaster is an actress and producer, known for Fred & Vinnie (2011), Dead Within (2014) and Retail Therapy (2012).
biography.name: Sarah McMaster

biography.bio: Amy Cale Peterson is known for her work on Dead Within (2014), The Living Worst (2016) and Documentary Now! (2015).
biography.name: Amy Cale Peterson

companyCreditsSimple.name: This is Just a Test Productions
